results.title: Infant cognition (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality and Learning”.
An exploration of the development of the bond between mother and her baby. Using special filming technique it analyses sequences of what is known as per-speech, a recently discovered phenomenon where babies, even of a few days old, take part in adult-type conversations with their mothers.

results.title: Socialisation: the Dragon School, Oxford (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Richard Argent, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality and Learning”.
Looks at the process of socialisation in the Dragon school, an Oxford preparatory school of some 600 pupils, mostly boys, but with 24 girls. Illustrates some of the values of the school, different teaching approaches and the attitude explicit and implicit to social control.

results.title: Learning problems : diagnosis and action (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Edward Milner, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality and Learning”.
Detailed account of some motor skills tasks, also concept and language tasks used for diagnosis and remediation with children showing specific learning difficulties. Demonstrates language master and Reynell language scales.

results.title: It all depends on your point of view (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality and Learning”.
Examines the differences in perceptions of events in a classroom in a modern comprehensive school. Traditional ideas about discipline are called into question by the program, which provides stimulating material for discussion about the methods and even the purposes of education.

results.title: Personality: Middle childhood
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality”.
The middle years are a time of increasing independence for children, finding a place among peers, arriving at new concepts of self, mastering new skills. The important role of parents in the development of a child’s self-esteem and self-confidence is discussed.

results.title: Early childhood
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personality”.
The experiences of pre-school children play a role in all aspects of their personality development. While there are many personality traits developing during this age period, several are of special significance: dependence, identification, aggression, fear and anxiety.

results.title: Personalities of Today

results.title: Hiroyuki Iwaki
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Personalities of Today”.
Shows day to day life of renowned Japanese conductor, Hiroyuki Iwaki as he is interviewed by music critic, Marcel Grily. Includes background scenes of city/country life in Japan and also shows Iwaki conducting in various European cities. Features the NHK Symphony Orchestra, Tokyo.
